title: Textile, 1920–30
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Polychrome block print on tan-yellow linen. Heavy grey strapwork symmetrically surrounds grey urn of red, white and yellow flowers with blue and green leaves. In smaller area of strapwork is a small grey bowl of fruit, - yellow pineapple, red apples, red cherries. Strapwork is connected by floral swags. Condition: soiled

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-36.
